Key Match Events: Nikola Vučević had 23 points and 13 rebounds
Coby White and Jalen Smith each scored 15 points
Jordan Poole led the Wizards with 22 points
Jared Butler added 18 points for Washington
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls spotted their guests the opening basket but took the lead for good a few possessions later
Up 68-58 at halftime, they turned the game into a rout with a 9-0 run midway through the third quarter
Others: Chicago got its fifth win in seven games and evened a 125-107 loss to the Wizards on Jan. 1
Ayo Dosunmu was out with a calf strain
Jordan Poole was a game-time decision but looked sharp early on
